mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.express_id AS "expressId", a.phone AS "phone", a.enter_time AS "enterTime", a.pick_up_code AS "pickUpCode", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.company AS "company", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.state AS "state", a.msg_state AS "msgState", wxu.name AS "sysWxUser.name", uc.name AS "createBy.name", uu.name AS "updateBy.name"
LEFT JOIN sys_user uc on uc.id = a.create_by LEFT JOIN sys_user uu on uu.id = a.update_by LEFT JOIN sys_wx_user wxu on wxu.phone = a.phone
mapper.select: SELECT max(pick_up_code) as pickUpCode FROM sys_express a WHERE a.company = #{0} AND a.enter_time = #{1}

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_express( id, express_id, phone, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, state, msg_state, pick_up_code, company, enter_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{expressId}, #{phone}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{state}, #{msgState}, #{pickUpCode}, #{company}, #{enterTime} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_express SET express_id = #{expressId}, phone = #{phone}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, msg_state = #{msgState}, state = #{state}, pick_up_code = #{pickUpCode}, company= #{company}, enter_time = #{enterTime} WHERE id = #{id}
